Show a second image when hovering over your collection items.


Super simple code snippet to quickly copy and paste into your Debut theme. No wasted time, no headaches. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.

One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this code snippet working live clicking here.

What you'll get:



This code snippet creates extra options at the customize page of your theme.


Below, whichever options have (customizable) are options that you'll be to enable, disable and/or customize in some way.


Here are all the current features:


✔️ Choose whether you want to show the second or last image on hover (customizable)

✔️ Subtle animation on hover (customizable - you can turn it on/off and also customize the delay of the transition)

✔️ Automatically fix aspect ratio (customizable - if the second image is larger/wider than the first one, it will automatically stretch it to make it look good)

✔️ Works with the "you may also like" section

✔️ Life time free updates
